title: Untitled
description: From a group of objects; two copies of \'PICTURE\' magazine (#4 and #12); three copies of \'FOTOFILE\' magazine; eighteen posters and one book, Jackson C. Thode, editor. \'William Henry Jackson\'s Rocky Mountain Railroad Album.  Silverton, Colorado Sundance Publications, 1976. 600/3000.
creditline: Gift of Dr. Lee A. Kitzenberg
